Recommendations

"Nate is an excellent software developer. I had the pleasure of working closely with Nate on several projects. Most of these projects required a software developer that was willing to try new technologies and push the envelope of programming. Nate always exceeded the expectations of Product Management. His attention to detail and desire to deliver quality product, made him a great asset to the company. I would highly recommend Nate to any employer."
Erik Larson, Product Manager of Identity Solutions (Lenel Systems International)
"Nate is interested in new technology and keeps himself current. He conducts thorough research and writes clear documentation. He demonstrates good common sense and keeps a level head under times of pressure. Nate would make a great asset to any organization."
Bob Rozwod, Senior Software Engineer and Architect (Lenel Systems International)
"Nate was an excellent software engineer who completed his projects on time and on target. He was a pleasure to work with, and wrote great code."
Robert Ansell, Digital Video Product Specialist (Lenel Systems International)
"Nate joined Jamestown Community College about two years ago, and has initiated and managed a period of peak growth for the college web site and online presence. Nate is very bright, analytical, and open to ideas and investigation. He maintains a good rapport with a diverse group of people from all areas of the college, and does so with an easy going nature and a sense of humor. It’s a great pleasure to work with Nate."
Elizabeth Booth, Director of Alumni Affairs (Jamestown Community College)
"Nate is truly an asset to our college community. He has successfully collaborated with our graphic designer and marketing rep., while working closely with the administration, faculty, staff and students to develope an entirely new web site which includes a content management system for our college Nate is not only able to present creative ideas, but also creative solutions when problems arise. I would highly recommend Nate for employment. He is a team player and would make a great asset to any organization."
